How to use these libraries

You’re actually on the GitHup Page of the MBED6 Libraries Git Repository.

This repository gathers ressources to integrate some components into embedded systems using Nucleo boards and MBED6 free open source IoT operating system.

This repository contains :

  • to do progs/brandname/src/ directory

Download files from the GitHub repository

There are different ways to get a copy of a repository’s files on GitHub. To have more informations on how to download a repository, use this tutorial: How To Use GitHub repositories from the LEnsE.

Create a MBED6 project

Keil Studio Cloud

MBED Studio

Paste files into the project

Compile and run
